group_1.narration: We're holding an emergency meeting@regarding the closing party,@so if you're a member of the committee@and you're free, please gather ASAP!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, do you know what our school's@closing party is?

group_1.textRight: Back in the day, when there were still a lot of@genuine rich young ladies...
They wanted to do things they couldn't do@at home, and thus...

group_1.textLeft: And the closing party...it's in trouble!
And even if we order what we need now,@it won't be ready in time!
I got an urgent call from the chairperson@of the committee...!

group_1.textRight: That's right...preparing for the closing party@is also the committee's responsibility.

group_1.textLeft: I can't believe the culprit is trying to ruin@the festival down to the very last minute...

group_1.textRight: You're even more enthusiastic about it@because it's all about food.
...But, if it's a committee meeting,@I can't attend.
I'm concerned about how things are going@in my class, so I'll just sit this one out.

group_1.textCenter: As I've already shared with you...
The skewers for the barbecue were destroyed...
The stack of boxes collapsed and all the skewers@inside were broken...

group_1.textRight: All of them? Is that even possible...?

group_1.textLeft: I couldn't believe it either, but everything was@in pieces...

group_1.textRight: ...Did the culprit snap all of them...?
Or did they rig it so that when the boxes@collapse, the skewers will break...?

group_1.textLeft: Regardless, this is a tradition of the@Mizuna Girls' Academy school festival.
We can't possibly hold it without the closing@barbecue party.

group_1.textRight: You're right! Something's end is always@important...!

group_1.textLeft: I can't believe it's my last school festival and@there won't be any barbecued skewers!

group_1.textRight: ...It's a tradition to reminisce with friends@over skewers...
Everyone is really looking forward to it...

group_1.textLeft: It's a major part of the school festival, so I think@they all have a special attachment to it.

group_1.textCenter: We don't have the skewers, but the@ingredients have arrived.
Let's all figure out a way to organize@the closing party!
A safe and fun way to do it, yeah!
Is there a way to do it without skewers...@Or should we find a substitute...?
If we want to be safe, we can't use something@we're not familiar with...
If all the students in the school are going to@participate, we'll need a lot of them...
Hmm...in order to hold the party...

select.textSelect: Maybe we could use tree branches@as substitutes for the skewers...?
I'm sure it would be delicious if we@grilled it without skewers...!

group_5.textCenter: Hmm...in order to hold the party...

select.textSelect: Maybe we could use tree branches@as substitutes for the skewers...?
I'm sure it would be delicious if we@grilled it without skewers...!
